body:
### Description

I have an html LibDGX project and there are several issues with jdtls.
`:checkhealth vim.lsp` shows that jdtls is attached with a correct root dir:
```
vim.lsp: Active Features ~
- inline_completion
  - Active buffers:

- semantic_tokens
  - Active buffers:
      [10]: jdtls (id: 1)
- folding_range
  - Active buffers:


vim.lsp: Active Clients ~
- jdtls (id: 1)
  - Version: 1.55.0-SNAPSHOT
  - Root directory: ~/Programming/java/PaybackKnight
  - Command: <function @/home/igor/.config/nvim/lsp/jdtls.lua:77>
  - Settings: {}
  - Attached buffers: 10
```
But there are no tree-sitter highlighting, diagnostics and code completion.
I have another LibJDX project that does work, the only difference is that the not-working project has html platform supported and because of that it has some `.gwt.xml` files here and there and uses Java 8 instead of Java 21.

I have already tried using plugins like nvim-jdtls and nvim-java, which didn't help and tried clearing jdtls cache, which also didnt help.

And also, i am using nightly neovim version
